name: Adjucto
description:
Embark on an interstellar adventure, jumping and dodging your way across a galaxy filled with planets and perilous meteors! Use your wits and gravity-shifting powers to navigate a variety of platforms and obstacles, all while collecting valuable coins to upgrade your skills and unlock new levels. Can you become the ultimate space explorer and conquer the cosmos?

Controls:

  • Arrows right and left to move around the planet [Explore mode]
  • Space to jump
  • Tab for disabling gravity [Planet mode]
